mapper.sql: PK_ID, UPLOAD_LOG_ID, NODE_SIGN, FILE_SERVER, FILE_LOCATION, FILE_SUFFIX, FILE_SIZE, FILE_MD5, RESOLVE_STATUS, RESOLVE_RESULT_INFO, RESOLVE_DATETIME
mapper.select:
select ryjcxxcjbh,
from LEDEN_UPLOAD_PACKET where PK_ID = #{pkId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
select * from ( select * from leden_upload_packet where resolve_status=0 and FILE_SUFFIX='zip' order by CREATE_DATETIME desc ) where rownum=1

select distinct p.pk_id,p.node_sign,p.file_location,l.UPLOAD_DATETIME,l.RYJCXXCJBH from LEDEN_UPLOAD_LOG l,leden_upload_packet p where l.pk_id = p.upload_log_id and l.is_empower = '1' and p.resolve_status = '0' and p.node_sign != '000000000000' order by node_sign asc
select * from leden_upload_packet a left join leden_collect_node n on a.node_sign = n.node_code left join leden_collect_person p on p.ryjcxxcjbh = a.ryjcxxcjbh where a.PK_ID = #{id}
select distinct data_type as datatype from LEDEN_UPLOAD_PACKET

select a.ryjcxxcjbh rybh,a.PK_ID,a.FILE_SERVER,a.RESOLVE_STATUS,a.FILE_SUFFIX,a.FILE_SIZE,a.RESOLVE_RESULT_INFO,a.RESOLVE_DATETIME,n.NODE_NAME,p.* from leden_upload_packet a left join leden_collect_node n on a.node_sign = n.node_code left join leden_collect_process s on s.collect_node_id = n.node_code left join leden_collect_person p on p.ryjcxxcjbh = s.ryjcxxcjbh
and a.PK_ID in
#{id}
and a.PK_ID = null
mapper.insert:
insert into LEDEN_UPLOAD_PACKET
PK_ID,
equipment_id,
ryjcxxcjbh,
NODE_SIGN,
FILE_SERVER,
FILE_LOCATION,
data_type,
create_datetime,
FILE_SUFFIX,
RESOLVE_STATUS,
RESOLVE_RESULT_INFO,
RESOLVE_DATETIME,
#{pkId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{equipmentId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{ryjcxxcjbh},
#{nodeSign,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{fileServer,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{fileLocation,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{dataType},
#{createDatetime},
#{fileSuffix,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{resolveStatus,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{resolveResultInfo,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{resolveDatetime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
mapper.update:
update LEDEN_UPLOAD_PACKET
UPLOAD_LOG_ID = #{uploadLogId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
NODE_SIGN = #{nodeSign,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
FILE_SERVER = #{fileServer,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
FILE_LOCATION = #{fileLocation,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
FILE_SUFFIX = #{fileSuffix,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
FILE_SIZE = #{fileSize,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
FILE_MD5 = #{fileMd5,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
RESOLVE_STATUS = #{resolveStatus,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
RESOLVE_RESULT_INFO = #{resolveResultInfo,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
RESOLVE_DATETIME = #{resolveDatetime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
where PK_ID = #{pkId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

update LEDEN_UPLOAD_PACKET set UPLOAD_LOG_ID = #{uploadLogId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, NODE_SIGN = #{nodeSign,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, FILE_SERVER = #{fileServer,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, FILE_LOCATION = #{fileLocation,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, FILE_SUFFIX = #{fileSuffix,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, FILE_SIZE = #{fileSize,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, FILE_MD5 = #{fileMd5,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, RESOLVE_STATUS = #{resolveStatus,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, RESOLVE_RESULT_INFO = #{resolveResultInfo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, RESOLVE_DATETIME = #{resolveDatetime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} where PK_ID = #{pkId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select: select * from leden_upload_packet where resolve_status in (0,2) and ryjcxxcjbh=#{_parameter} and data_type!='zip'
